question: Congcong, Lianlian and Chenchen are the recently released mascots of which international sporting event?
explanation:
The official mascots of the 2022 Asian Games were released at a digital launch ceremony in China recently. 
Congcong, Lianlian and Chenchen are named as the mascots of the 19th Asian Games, which is scheduled to be held at Hangzhou, China. Three robots nicknamed as ‘Smart Triplets’, representing the mascots were unveiled, to highlight the expertise of the city.
